block.p: ''Everybody thinks landlords are bad and we can steal from them. We live in a life of double standards. We have all these great people who go to work, donate to charities, talk about how the war is horrible -- but everybody still thinks it's O.K. to have the Robin Hood mentality.''
BRUCE FRANKEL, a private investigator who gathers evidence against tenants of rent-regulated apartments. [A1]
